segments.text: Mary , why don't you come to my house this Saturday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . I'll have to ask my host mom .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on , Mary . This is America . You make your own decisions here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I still have to tell her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tell you what , give me your phone number .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Got it . I'll call you later tonight and we can talk about what to do on Saturday .
segments.speaker: S2
